snippet.title: 2015 BMW X4 drops the roof (pictures)
snippet.description: The all-new X4 features a slanted back roof on an SUV body, following the unique profile previously set by the X6 model.

snippet.title: Smarter Driver: New innovations in roof design
snippet.description: The roof of your car is mostly a place to mount the sunroof, but it's in the middle of a technology revolution that makes it a major piece of safety tech.

snippet.title: Bromium secures computers by holding apps in isolation
snippet.description: New security software separates apps and their processes from the operating system to keep attacks at bay.

snippet.title: MEElectronics M11P+ Sound-Isolation In-Ear Headphones
snippet.description: The MEElectronics M11P+ earphones offer an ultracompact design, plenty of bass, and a handy integrated mic, making them a good choice for music phone owners with a penchant for dance and hip-hop.

snippet.title: Microsoft and Apple: The roof tile analogy
snippet.description: The Microsoft Surface tablet needs the Microsoft Store -- or something just like it. The hey day of CompUSA-like big box retailers is fading fast.

snippet.title: Was it space junk that trashed the roof?
snippet.description: A mysterious chunk of metal crashes into a warehouse in Plymouth, Massachusetts. The FAA discounts speculation that it came from a plane, while an astronomer offers an alternative theory.

snippet.title: Workers threaten to jump off roof in Foxconn protest
snippet.description: According to reports out of China, the workers are upset with their wages, despite Foxconn agreeing to improve working conditions.

snippet.title: Koss Portable Isolation Earbud (Black)
snippet.description: There are better earbud options in the $100 price range, but the Koss KEB/79 offers a couple of interesting features that may appeal to some users. Plus, they offer good sound--if you can get a proper fit.

snippet.title: GE: Solar panels will be as easy to install as new roof
snippet.description: A $5.9 million research program seeks to cut the installation cost of solar in half for home systems by building standardized components for racking and wiring.

snippet.title: Need a new roof? Solar power's included
snippet.description: OneRoof Energy offers solar cells integrated into roofing materials and a lease that avoids the upfront cost of installing panels.
